messages.message:
Hello Italy nice to make your acquaintance. I'll have to admit, I was caught off guard by your entrance into Trieste, but I think it could work out well for you. 

I would like to ask if I will be bounced if I move to VIE, and if you have any other plans for the future that might be to both of our benefit?
messages.input:
Message from RUSSIA:'Hello Italy nice to make your acquaintance. I'll have to admit, I was caught off guard by your entrance into Trieste, but I think it could work out well for you. 

I would like to ask if I will be bounced if I move to VIE, and if you have any other plans for the future that might be to both of our benefit?'.
messages.output: You should not trust the message. Russia's surprise at your move and sudden interest in your plans may indicate a willingness to mislead in order to gather information or create a false sense of security. Be cautious in your interactions with Russia to protect your position.
